casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. KITRICK
v.
COLUMBUS 2018-1666 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 20, 2019

O'CONNOR, C.J., and KENNEDY, FRENCH, FISCHER, DEWINE, DONNELLY, and STEWART, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISION WITHOUT OPINION

On respondents' motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. Relators' motion for leave to file first amended complaint in mandamus granted.
